mapper.select:
select
from check_question_option where question_id = #{questionId} and is_deleted = 0 order by option_index asc
mapper.sql: id, score, question_id, option_desc, option_index, update_by, update_time, create_by, create_time, is_deleted

select
distinct
from check_question_option
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into check_question_option (id, score, question_id, option_desc, option_index, update_by, update_time, create_by, create_time, is_deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{optionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT})
